title: Armor Network.
subtitle: A fast, easy and anonymous payment system.
text3: Thanks to Armor technology, you can make transfers from any place. Payments are immediate and confirmed in a few minutes.
text5: Armor is based on the BlockChain technology. There is no central entity controlling the system, it is the whole network who validates each data.
text7: Armor is a payment system ready for use wherever you are, even in remote places. We work to build a simple and easy network.
text9: Here, some details of the Network
text23: Every day we work to improve the network
text25: A protocol to prove money transfers
text28: Armor provides anonymity in each transaction, this means that only participants of a given transaction know the details about it.
text30: We have substantially reduced the time between blocks. Now, one block is discovered every 120 seconds, this makes the network very fast. Armor transactions are sent instantly and confirmed in just a few minutes.
text32: Armor team is made up of Software Engineers. We study the behavior of the network and regularly release updates in order to improve the network day after day.
text34: Armor is Open Source project, behind Armor is a free software community. This community brings new ideas and improvements.
text36: We highly value user experience to learn the behaviour of the network helping users through our channels: Twitter, Telegram, e-mail...
text38: We are building a network ready to use in real life. Our goal is to achieve a payment system that everyone can use. Armor is designed for both companies and individuals.
text42: We have developed a Telegram Wallet. We think that making a transfer should be as simple as sending a message to your friends. Armor is not related with Telegram but we know how to use the technology Telegram provides.
text44: Armor Network is accessible from any place, even remote locations. Everyone should have access to Armor Network.
text46: With the new BlockChain technology Armor is a secure network.
text48: We want a fast network. We improved the BlockChain to achieve it.
text51: Use the power of your CPU/GPU
text52: Connect your hardware to any Armor pool
text54: We need help! Whatever your skill is or whatever ideas you have, we are ready to hear them! Join us!
text57: Install Armor v1.2 from Github! Make sure your software is up-to-date with the October 17th upgrade.
text59: If you run a pool, please submit a Pull Request
text76: Armor was born in May 2018 as a project. It was just an idea.
text79: We release the first Wallet under Telegram. It was a private beta version to detect errors and improve it. Armor was not born yet.
text82: The source code is released and the first pools are opened in order to mine Armor coins. From here the Armor community begins. People from anywhere bring new ideas and help to make the network bigger.
text85: First version of the Armor Desktop wallet will be released: - MacOS - Linux - Windows
text88: Armor has been listed on Exchanges. You can mine Armor with your CPU/GPU but if you prefer you can obtain Armor easily through Exchanges. We work every day to list Armor on as many number of Exchanges as possible. We think that Armor has to be available for everyone.
text94: We want to create a network beyond the currencies. Smart contracts of easy creation is our goal. We will start the development once the initial phase is finished.
text97: In the long term we want to build the Armor payment system to be used in everyday life. This is a great challenge without a doubt.
text99: The Telegram Wallet is the best option.
